Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Livongo Blood Glucose Monitoring System (BG1000) for self-monitoring blood glucose in capillary whole blood using an amperometric electrochemical method.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertips for self-testing by people with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control programs; for single-patient use and not intended for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or use on neonates.
